name: Infinity Dance
description:
Imitate your favorite dance video's. Simply upload an mp4 and start dancing!

Features
  • Add your own dance video's (They are stored in your browsers IndexedDB and do not leave your computer)
  • Play without holding a controller
  • Full body movement detection
  • Awesome graphics
  • Get high scores on your scoreboard
  • No Game Engine (Vanilla JS + PoseNet)
Upcoming
  • Controller support for song selection
  • Multiplayer
  • Search
Donate & References

Currently, donations aren't supported.
But you can still donate to these awesome projects and programs that I used to create this game:

  • https://soundimage.org/
  • https://www.kenney.nl/
  • https://inkscape.org
  • https://www.mozilla.org
  • www.gedit.org
  • https://arxiv.org/abs/1803.08225
Statistics for nerds

WebAPI's used:

  • IndexedDB
  • WebGL
  • WebAudio
  • Drag and drop API
  • SVG
